short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters certain URLs when searching in Google page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Filter for Google search.
Register your Keyword of your preference, and the extension will detect the keyword in the search results and you can Highlight / Delete the results from  the page.
